SELECT tsdh.orderid, too.endtime as before_cleartime, (select IFNULL(sum(tod.dishnum*tod.orignalprice),0) from t_order_detail_history tod where tod.orderid = too.orderid) -(SELECT IFNULL(sum(dishnum*orignalprice),0) FROM t_order_detail_history WHERE orderid = too.orderid and dishtype = 2 and superkey = primarykey) as before_shouldamount, IFNULL(sum(tsdh.payamount),0)-IFNULL(tsh.Inflated,0) as before_paidamount, too.userid as waiter, tsh.userid as cashier, tsh.authorizer_name FROM t_settlement_detail_history tsdh, t_order_history too, t_settlement_history tsh WHERE tsdh.orderid = too.orderid AND tsdh.orderid = tsh.orderid
AND too.endtime BETWEEN str_to_date(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND str_to_date(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND tsh.reason not in('??????,??????' ,'会员结算失败,系统自动反结') AND tsdh.payway in (0,1,5,8,13,17,18) AND too.orderstatus = 3 group by tsdh.orderid

SELECT tsd.orderid, too.endtime as after_cleartime, (select IFNULL(sum(tod.dishnum*tod.orignalprice),0) from t_order_detail tod where tod.orderid = too.orderid) -(SELECT IFNULL(sum(dishnum*orignalprice),0) FROM t_order_detail_history WHERE orderid = too.orderid and dishtype = 2 and superkey = primarykey and orderid = #{orderid}) as after_shouldamount, IFNULL(sum(tsd.payamount),0) as after_paidamount, ts.userid as cashier FROM t_settlement_detail tsd, t_order too, t_settlement ts WHERE tsd.orderid = too.orderid AND tsd.orderid = ts.orderid AND tsd.payway in (0,1,5,8,13,17,18) AND tsd.orderid = #{orderid}

SELECT tt.tableNo FROM t_order too, t_table tt, t_tablearea tta WHERE too.currenttableid = tt.tableid AND tt.areaid = tta.areaid
AND too.orderid = #{orderid}
select Inflated from t_order_member where orderid = #{orderid}
select payway,IFNULL(payamount,0.00) as payamount from t_settlement_detail where orderid = #{orderid} and payway in (7,20)
select IFNULL(sum(tod.dishnum*tod.orignalprice),0.00) as totalconsumption from t_order_detail tod where orderid = #{orderid} and pricetype <> 1
select IFNULL(sum(payamount),0.00) as paidamount from t_settlement_detail where orderid = #{orderid} and payway in (0,1,5,8,13,17,18)
select IFNULL(sum(orignalprice),0.00) as giveamount from t_order_detail where orderid = #{orderid} and pricetype = 1
select IFNULL(sum(dishnum*orignalprice),0.00) as taocan from t_order_detail where orderid = #{orderid} and dishtype = 2 AND superkey <> primarykey
